backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook outlining steps to retry deployment and verify required assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens and global theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page loading the main React script.
frontend/scripts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the scripts directory in version control.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy-and-captur: Deployment script that logs environment details, checks required images, and runs dfx and frontend build steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component managing the landing, gifts, and final screens via local state.
frontend/src/components/BalloonRiseAnima: Shows rising balloon animations for a timed sequence before continuing workflow.
frontend/src/components/GiftCard.tsx: Interactive gift card component with locked, unlocked, and opened states and open animations.
frontend/src/components/LayoutShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing gradient background and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/SafeGeneratedIma: Image loader that shows loading and fallback UI when generated assets fail to load.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Holds static Valentine content including messages and filenames for required images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login flow, stored identities, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module placeholder exporting nothing as no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, Valentine-themed utilities, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/FinalCelebrationScr: Displays the final celebration image and animated hearts using the provided final couple photo.
frontend/src/screens/GiftsScreen.tsx: Implements a multi‑step gift‑opening screen with dialogs, animations, photo reveals, and progression logic.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Renders the Valentine question screen with a moving 'No' button and calls a handler when 'Yes' is clicked.
frontend/src/utils/randomPosition.ts: Generates a random top/left position for an element within container bounds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and extended utilities for the app’s styling.
project_state.json: Describes the Valentine website’s current state, features, architectural notes, and known issues. Highlights photo-asset problems in Gift 2 and marks the file as a fix request.
